EndTime.description: The end of the time period for the attacks.

MaxResults.description: The maximum number of AttackSummary objects to be returned. If this is left blank, the first 20 results will be returned.

NextToken.description: The ListAttacksRequest.NextMarker value from a previous call to ListAttacksRequest. Pass null if this is the first call.

ResourceArns.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the resource that was attacked. If this is left blank, all applicable resources for this account will be included.

StartTime.description: The time period for the attacks.
